---
title: "Primers on qualitative data and analysis"
---

If you have never had formal masters-level training in qualitative enquiry, we recommend you follow some introductory material before you atten the NVivo workshops. This will help you get the most out of the day.

## What is qualitative enquiry and data?

Engage with one or all of the following:

- [The Discipline and Practice of Qualitative Research](https://perpus.univpancasila.ac.id/repository/%5bNorman_K._Denzin,_Yvonna_S._Lincoln%5d_The_SAGE_Han(z-lib.org).pdf) which is Chapter 1 in Denzin and Lincoln, eds. (2018) *The SAGE Handbook of Qualitative Research*. 5th ed. London: SAGE Publications.
- [Introduction to qualitative research methods - Part 1](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC10003579/) by Bhangu, Provost, and Caduff (2023) in *Perspectives in Clinical Research* 14(1) pp.39-42
- [Qualitative research the basics](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N-NQws-_t_U) YouTube video by Degree Doctor (Dr Elizabeth Yardley)



## What is coding?

- [An Introduction to Codes and Coding](https://emotrab.ufba.br/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Saldana-2013-TheCodingManualforQualitativeResearchers.pdf) which is Chapter 1 in Saldaña (2013) _The Coding Manual for Qualitative Researchers_. 2nd ed. London: Sage Publications Ltd.



## What is thematic analysis?

Thematic analysis is a commonly used method within qualitative analysis, suitable for using with software like NVivo.

**Papers**:

- Braun, Virginia, and Victoria Clarke (2006) ‘Using Thematic Analysis in Psychology’. _Qualitative Research in Psychology_ 3(2):77–101. doi: [10.1191/1478088706qp063oa](https://doi.org/10.1191/1478088706qp063oa).
- Braun, Virginia, and Victoria Clarke (2019) ‘Reflecting on Reflexive Thematic Analysis’. _Qualitative Research in Sport, Exercise and Health_ 11(4):589–97. doi: [10.1080/2159676X.2019.1628806](https://doi.org/10.1080/2159676X.2019.1628806).
- Byrne, David. (2022) ‘A Worked Example of Braun and Clarke’s Approach to Reflexive Thematic Analysis’. _Quality & Quantity_ 56(3):1391–1412. doi: [10.1007/s11135-021-01182-y](https://doi.org/10.1007/s11135-021-01182-y).
- Kiger, Michelle E., and Lara Varpio. (2020) ‘Thematic Analysis of Qualitative Data: AMEE Guide No. 131’. _Medical Teacher_ 42(8):846–54. doi: [10.1080/0142159X.2020.1755030](https://doi.org/10.1080/0142159X.2020.1755030).

**YouTube**:

- [Thematic analysis in qualitative research](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zC6H5v2yuxc) by Degree Doctor (Dr Elizabeth Yardley)
